application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of a preliminary risk assessment report, pursuant to Condition 4; details of a site investigation scheme, pursuant to Condition 5; details of a quantitative risk assessment report, pursuant to Condition 6; details of a remediation method statement pursuant to Condition 7; details of the sound insulation of the floor/ ceiling/ walls separating the commercial part(s) of the premises from the basement dwelling (Flat 1) and the first-floor dwelling (Flat 2), pursuant to Condition 10; details of an enhanced sound insulation value DnT,w and L'nT,w of at least 5dB above the Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating the adjoining dwellings at first floor (Flat 2) and second-floor (Flat 3) levels, pursuant to Condition 11; details of a Construction Logistics Plan, pursuant to Condition 12; and details of a Construction Management Plan, pursuant to Condition 13 of planning permission reference: 2023/02697/FUL dated 13th June 2024.
